features: TWIN WIRE BOUND: Twin wire notebook with perforated pages that feature day and month headers to help you stay on track
LARGE SIZE: Measures 8.25 x 11.625-inches 160 Lined, acid-free pages that takes ink and pencil beautifully
TEXTURED DESIGN: Features gold accents in a deep ebony hue
INFORMATIONAL PAGES: Includes handy references featuring equivalents, holiday overview, conversion charts, and space for your personal notes

ECO-FRIENDLY WITHOUT SACRIFICING QUALITY: Nashville-based DesignWorks Ink proudly uses soy-based ink, an excellent alternative to petroleum or oil-based inks that produces brighter, more vibrant color
body.description: Twin wire notebook with perforated pages that feature day and month headers to help you stay on track. 160 Lined, acid-free pages that takes ink and pencil beautifully. DesignWorks Ink was founded in 2014 by a group of dedicated and talented individuals that are as passionate about journals as they are great design. Their mission is to create products that are beautifully designed and also provide exceptional quality. They proudly use acid-free papers and soy based ink in all of their products. Think Big. Write On!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elevating the Journaling Experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently dove into the world of creative journaling with this DesignWorks Journal, and it's safe to say that this sleek and stylish journal has earned a solid five stars from me.Let's talk aesthetics. The black textured cover is visually striking and exudes a touch of sophistication. It's the kind of journal that makes a statement, whether it's resting on my desk or tucked away in my bag.The A4 size is a winner for me. It provides ample space for my thoughts, sketches, and doodles without feeling cumbersome. It strikes that perfect balance between being substantial and portable, making it an ideal companion for both creative endeavors and everyday note-taking.Now, let's dive into the paper quality. The textured pages are a delight to write on. The texture adds a tactile element that elevates the writing experience. The paper weight is substantial enough to prevent bleed-through, even with my favorite fountain pen.The attention to detail in the design is evident. The dotted lines make it versatile for both writing and sketching, giving me the freedom to express myself in various ways. The clean, minimalist layout provides structure without feeling restrictive.Journals are not always the most durable, but this one holds up well. The binding is sturdy, and the pages are securely attached. It's evident that DesignWorks Ink prioritizes quality in both design and construction.In conclusion, this journal is a standout in the world of stationery. It's not just a notebook; it's a canvas for creativity, a stylish companion for daily thoughts, and an overall joy to use. Five stars without a doubt – it's a journal that combines form and function seamlessly! 🌟📓✒️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best quality notebook I actually use
reviews.reviewText: I write a lot. I have since I was a teen. I’ve gone through a lot of notebooks and, for some reason, this style is the most impressive and delightful to use.Along the top of each page, the months and day numbers are listed, so you can just circle them to mark the day. Then there’s a useful space where you can basically put a title for your page. Love that simple organization.The best part is how much page space you get.All my notes, thoughts, plans, everything can sit on the page, spread out before me. It’s a visual dream all kept together in one place, which is huge for me. My brain needs to see it laid out like that and this does the trick so well. I’m way more productive because of it.Since we were basically trained to use those spiral bound notebooks in school, this feels so natural. It’s essentially the premium version. The paper has a nice weight and texture to it.If you’re looking for a notebook that’s nice but not as intimidating as a leather journal, this is a solid choice. You may get hooked— the last few ones I’ve purchased sit so nicely on my shelf verses the ones I’ve stored in my plastic bin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Colorful Affair with Texture and Warmth
reviews.reviewText: My love affair with Notebook Journals has only deepened since I introduced a couple of them in different colors into my collection. The allure of these journals goes beyond their eye-catching hues; it extends to the delightful paper texture that elevates the writing experience. The warmth of the colors not only adds a personalized touch to my note-taking but also creates an inviting ambiance whenever I open these journals. Whether I'm jotting down thoughts, sketches, or plans, the quality of the paper and the comforting hues create a harmonious synergy that enhances the overall journaling experience. If you appreciate the subtle pleasures of writing, these Notebook Journals are an absolute delight, seamlessly blending aesthetics with functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful journal
reviews.reviewText: This beautiful notebook by Designworks INK is the perfect size, the rings are gold and sturdy, the cover is thick and has pretty lined details, it protects the inside well. The thickness of the paper is great. Your pen will not go through. It's crisp and feels wonderful. On the top the months are abbreviated, along with numbers for the month. There is a subject line. I love it so much that it's my go to for Christmas, Birthday, and just because gifts. Enjoy your lovely journal :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite notebook that I have ever used for work. I really like the dating system that you just circled the month and day instead of having to write it every day it is unique and saves a little bit of time which overall helps me to date more of my pages than I ever have before. This has come in handy on multiple occasions when looking back for something I wrote down on a specific day.The pages are also nice and thick, but not so thick as to reduce the number of pages in the notebook. The covers are a nice texturized and thick stock and look very nice and professional. The spiral binding is also high-end and heavy duty. I have not ever had an issue with the binding bending or coming undone. I just finished my second notebook and have two more coming today.Highly recommended , there is not one thing I don’t like about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the product but packaging needs work
reviews.reviewText: I love these spiral notebooks and I've ordered several in different orders. However, they usually come bent. It would be nice if Amazon worked on the packaging when shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love these notebooks. The months and days along the top allow me to easily keep track of daily notes with only one date. I really like the size as it allows more days in each notebook. The covers are hard and it makes it easy to take notes any where. This is my notebook of choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best notebook!
reviews.reviewText: This is hands down my favorite notebook to use for work! I love the date feature at the top of the page, that you can easily rip pages out, and how sturdy it is! It also is such a pretty notebook! I have re bought this 3 times!
